languages.text: "Думаешь, Его милосердие настолько велико? Я видел многих из тех, кто жаждет быть нашими пастырями. Им застит глаза власть, их руки жадно гребут все, до чего могут дотянуться. Экклезиархия давно нуждается в очищении".

traits.locale_text: "Думаешь, его милосердие настолько велико? Я видел многих из тех, кто жаждет быть нашими пастырями. Им застит глаза власть, их руки жадно гребут все, до чего могут дотянуться. Экклезиархия давно нуждается в очищении".

languages.text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."
languages.original_text: "Думаешь, Его милосердие настолько велико? Я видел многих из тех, кто жаждет быть нашими пастырями. Им застит глаза власть, их руки жадно гребут все, до чего могут дотянуться. Экклезиархия давно нуждается в очищении".

traits.locale_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

"You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

"You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

"You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

languages.text: “你以为祂真的会怜悯那些人吗？我见过很多人，那些人本来有希望成为我们的牧人，但权力蒙蔽了他们的视线，他们贪婪的手拿走了他们能触碰到的一切。国教早就应该进行一场清洗了。”
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: “你以为祂真的会怜悯那些人吗？我见过很多人，那些人本来有希望成为我们的牧人，但权力蒙蔽了他们的视线，他们贪婪的手拿走了他们能触碰到的一切。国教早就应该进行一场清洗了。”

languages.text: «¿Cree que Su misericordia abarca tanto? He conocido a muchos que anhelaban ser pastores, pero el poder les nubla, y sus manos llenas de codicia acaban acaparando tanto como pueden. Hace tiempo que la Eclesiarquía necesita una purga».
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que Su misericordia abarca tanto? He conocido a muchos que anhelaban ser pastores, pero el poder les nubla, y sus manos llenas de codicia acaban acaparando tanto como pueden. Hace tiempo que la Eclesiarquía necesita una purga».

languages.text: 「主の憐れみがそこまで及ぶとお思いで？我が教団の羊飼いになりたがる人を多く見てきました。権力は彼らの視野を曇らせ、その貪欲な手は届くものすべてをすくい上げます。今さら帝国聖教会を浄化しようと思っても手遅れでしょう」
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: 「主の憐れみがそこまで及ぶとお思いで？我が教団の羊飼いになりたがる人を多く見てきました。権力は彼らの視野を曇らせ、その貪欲な手は届くものすべてをすくい上げます。今さら帝国聖教会を浄化しようと思っても手遅れでしょう」

languages.text: "Denkt Ihr, dass seine Gnade so weit reicht? Ich habe viele gesehen, die unsere Schäfer sein wollen. Die Macht vernebelt ihren Blick, und ihre gierigen Hände raffen alles zusammen, dessen sie habhaft werden. Die Ekklesiarchie bedarf schon lange einer Reinigung."
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt Ihr, dass seine Gnade so weit reicht? Ich habe viele gesehen, die unsere Schäfer sein wollen. Die Macht vernebelt ihren Blick, und ihre gierigen Hände raffen alles zusammen, dessen sie habhaft werden. Die Ekklesiarchie bedarf schon lange einer Reinigung."

languages.text: « Vous pensez que Sa mansuétude est aussi grande ? Nombreux sont ceux souhaitant devenir nos bergers. Leur vision est voilée par le pouvoir, et leurs mains avides accaparent tout ce qui est à leur portée. Il est plus que temps de purifier l'Ecclésiarchie. »
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez que Sa mansuétude est aussi grande ? Nombreux sont ceux souhaitant devenir nos bergers. Leur vision est voilée par le pouvoir, et leurs mains avides accaparent tout ce qui est à leur portée. Il est plus que temps de purifier l'Ecclésiarchie. »

languages.text: "O'nun merhameti sence o kadar uzaklara erişir mi? Bize rehberlik etmek isteyen nicesini gördüm. Güç, gözlerine perde çekiyor; açgözlü elleri uzanabildiği her şeye yapışıyor. Ekleşiarşi'nin arındırılma zamanı geldi de geçiyor bile."
languages.original_text: "You think that His mercy extends that far? I have seen many who wish to be our shepherds. Power clouds their vision, and their greedy hands scoop up all that they can reach. The Ecclesiarchy is long overdue for a cleansing."

traits.locale_text: "Merhametinin o derece büyük olduğuna inanıyor musun? Bize çobanlık etmek isteyen nicesini gördüm. Güç, bakışlarını bulanıklaştırıyor ve açgözlülükleri, ellerinin uzandığı her şeyi elde etmeye çalışıyor. Ekleşiarşi'nin çok uzun süredir arındırılmaya ihtiyacı var."
